p1: Sandbox is Northeastern's student-led software consultancy building software for researchers, professors, and the student community. We've helped academic researchers looking to collect experimental data, deans looking to analyze student data, and students looking to find the right classes. We work closely with clients to help them best leverage computation.
p2: For someone that wants software built, finding the right student for the job is a challenge. Sandbox works by assembling a team of dedicated, talented students who have the right skill sets to get the job done. We're committed to finishing projects and are determined to leave a real impact.
